UI_visible_response: In 2020, a fire accident occurred at Songzao Coal Mine on September 27. The fire took place on an uphill belt with a large dip angle, designated as No. 2, which transports coal uphill1. This incident resulted in the deaths of 16 miners due to carbon monoxide poisoning when a conveyor belt caught fire2. Additionally, there were other accidents around the same time; for instance, high carbon monoxide levels trapped miners, leading to further fatalities3. These events highlighted ongoing safety issues within the mine4.
traffic_visible_response: In 2020, a fire accident occurred at Songzao Coal Mine on September 27. The fire took place on an uphill belt with a large dip angle, designated as No. 2, which transports coal uphill [[1]]. This incident resulted in the deaths of 16 miners due to carbon monoxide poisoning when a conveyor belt caught fire [[2]]. Additionally, there were other accidents around the same time; for instance, high carbon monoxide levels trapped miners, leading to further fatalities [[3]]. These events highlighted ongoing safety issues within the mine [[4]].
